img.title: Senior Ad Information

p.style: text-align: center;
p.span: Welcome to Leonard Independent School District. Thank you for taking the time to find out more about LISD and the many excellent programs we have available for our students. These programs are made possible by tremendous parent and community support, as well as our hardworking and dedicated staff.

p.style: text-align: center;
text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; text-align: center;

p.style: text-align: center; margin-left: 15px;
text-align: center; margin-left: 15px;
text-align: center; margin-left: 15px;

strong.span:
LISD will be closed for the remainder of the current 2019-2020 school year.
See letter below.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

hr.p: Dear Leonard ISD Parents and Community Members,

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

hr.p: This afternoon, Governor Greg Abbott, issued an Executive Order with additional guidance on school closures. While Texas school buildingsare to remain closed through the end of the current 2019-20 school year, at-home instructional support must continue through this time. Leonard ISD will continue to follow our school calendar for our At-Home Learning Plan, with school officially scheduled to end on Friday, May 22. LISD is grateful to all of our families for your support during this unprecedented health crisis. We could not do this without your partnership. Our focus remains to provide our students and families with the guidance and support needed to ensure learning progresses. Please do not hesitate to contact our staff if you have questions or need assistance. We miss our kids and families.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

hr.p: As the governor will soon begin to start the process of opening our state in phases, we ask that you and your family continue to follow the latestrecommendations to stay well and to limit the spread of this virus. By doing so, we are all hopeful for areturn to a more normal way of life sooner rather than later. To our seniors and families, Leonard ISD will continue making arrangements to recognize our graduating Class of 2020. While we will have to make adjustments in order to follow health and safety guidelines,you will be honored as close to the original graduation date of May 22 as possible. More information will be shared with you as soon as the Texas Education Agency provides guidance for Texas schools to follow regarding graduation ceremonies during the current health situation.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

hr.p: Thank you again for your support of Leonard ISD. Stay well.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

p.style: color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: As of Saturday, December 7, 2019, TxConnect will change to Ascender Parent Portal. TxConnect is the software application that you use to check your students grades, attendance, etc. You will NOT need to create a new username and password, as you will be able to use your previous login credentials. If you have any questions please contact your student's campus for assistance.

p.style: color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: This change is being driven by TXEIS, who is moving to the Ascender platform. The platform interface looks different from the old one, but the new platform is much more robust and will provide more & improved information for our families.

p.style: color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;
color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: Use the latest version of these Recommended Browsers for the best experience.

p.style: color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;

color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;
p.strong: Parents who have bookmarked the page and log into the previous url site will be automatically redirected to the new Ascender Parent Portal. There will also be a redirect for anyone who uses the txConnectmobile.

p.style: color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;
p.strong: How to Pin Parent Portal Shortcut on Apple and Android

ol.style: color: #22293d; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.15px; background-color: #ffffff;
ol.li: Open a browser on your device.
Browse to the district Ascender website. iPhone users will need to use the Safari browser. Android users may use Chrome.
For iPhone, in the Safari browser, click the box with the arrow at bottom of page and choose Add to Home Screen.
For Android, in Chrome, click the three dots in upper right corner of screen and choose Add to Home Screen.

div.span: The Leonard Independent School District will partner with parents and the community to create life-long learners who are academically and socially prepared to be productive citizens. We are proud to provide a safe and respectful learning environment where all children are challenged through stimulating learning experiences to achieve their dreams. "At LISD we are investing in the future of our students."

p.br:
#1 Tiger Alley | Leonard, TX 75452
Phone: 903.587.2318 | Fax: 903.587.2845 | Webmaster
